name: Surfing prototype
description:
This is the prototype for a surfing game I am making. Inspired by the surfing mini-game in California games for the NES.

The next step will be to nail an art-style and have different looking waves to create some variation. I want there to be several different boards, ranging from various "real" looking boards to crazy cartoon boards.

It will be an "endless runner" type game. Ride the wave and do tricks to earn a high-score, collect coins to buy new boards.
